title: From Carson’s Couch to Nixon’s Enemies List
description:
On The Gist, comedian David Steinberg joins us to share favorite tales from his life making comedy history. His new show is called The David Steinberg Podcast. For the Spiel, Mike takes on the manhunt for Saleh Abdeslam in Brussels. 
Today’s sponsor:  
The Message, a new podcast series from GE Podcast Theater. Be sure to catch up before the final episode airs this Sunday evening.
Join Slate Plus! Members get bonus segments, exclusive member-only podcasts, and more. Sign up for a free trial today at slate.com/gistplus.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
